comment_body: I wish I knew. I read once that a lot of cluster B are "aggressively thin skinned" and it's so so true. I get fixated on revenge for this reason.
Turn input that hurts you into a joke

I can relate especially right now. Feeling pretty fucking “wounded” at the moment. I need to learn to let these things effect me less but I can’t help but get overwhelmed by anger and general unease from a blow to my ego.
